answers.answer: Lyme messes with many body systems and levels, so it would not be a surprise if it messes with cholesterol too. Someone else here may have personal experience on this.

I actually got high cholesterol and diabetes from Lyme. I never had it before and that is what my LLMD believes. I also got Hoshimotos, and Lupus and many more things from Lyme.  It really plays with every part of your body.
I found a "master list" of Lyme symptoms that is very detailed.  One of the symptoms listed is "galloping cholesterol or triglycerides".

question: Does anyone know ?Is there an established link between lyme desiese cholesterol?thank you
title: Can lyme disease elavate cholesterol
